name: Honey On the Slaughter
description:
The diabolical Oggie gang has taken over the city. The citizens are now too fearful to even leave their homes. In their broken homes, they pray for a hero, but sometimes when you need a hero, the world sends a monster.

Buddy has stolen a large sum of the gang's money and they're out for his blood! Too bad they can't have it if they're all dead!

Though there is no end, there is a special surprise for anyone who reaches 6000 points,

For offline play, or to just data dig, download the source file.

Offical Wiki Page: https://radkoil.fandom.com/wiki/Honey_on_the_Slaughter
